Welcome to Sphinx Pages’s documentation!¶

Following you can find the documentation of the Python interface pyffb for the BRUNNER CLS2Sim protocol v2 targeting specifically the CLS-E force feedback joystick. Contributions for extensions to other devices in the product sortiment are welcome!
